title: inosin45555
author: inosin45555
content: I need documents French, Italian and Austrian with a selfie.It's best if he can hold the document with his hands, make it good quality and all the edges in the picture to seeTelegramÂ  @Inosin

comments.author: drexelhub
comments.created_time: June 27, 2022, 03:08:05 PMLast edit: June 28, 2022, 11:41:30 AM by drexelhub
comments.body: It depends on the type of document you need. For example, my friend has a firm registered in Lithuania and he is from the UK, so he needed to translate most of his papers in Lithuanian. He went to a translation agency and got everything done in a day. There're also other types of documents like I have - CMR documents/waybills. These papers are difficult to draw by yourself and you have to ask for help or find an example of this document and fill it with your information. However, not all of the examples on the internet are right, so I use https://supercmr.com/ to avoid mistakes and to keep my data safe.
